data.message: My dad's can't get into his face book account he can't remember his password we'll he's remembering an old one because it does say he's typing something that was changed 10 months ago but he can't remember what he switched it to, and when he can't remember the password of the email that he used for Facebook as he doesn't use it. How can he verify who he is and get back into his account.

replies.message: Hey Nancy. If your dad can't remember his password or access the email associated with his account, there may be a few things he can try. Learn more in our Help Center here: http://bit.ly/2AJxc6v. -Elizabeth
Can you help me too Facebook? Ive been contacting you and you are not responding. Are you blind?
